recipes.name: Baked Italian Sausage and Peppers
recipes.description: Sheet pan sausage with bell peppers and onions, tossed in olive oil and Italian herbs.
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Slice peppers and onion and toss with olive oil, seasoning, salt, and pepper.
Add sausages to a sheet pan with the vegetables.
Bake for 25–30 minutes, flipping sausages halfway through.
Serve with crusty bread or over rice.

recipes.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: Creamy tomato-based curry with marinated chicken, served over basmati rice.
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least 30 minutes.
Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger in a pan until softened.
Add marinated chicken and cook until browned.
Pour in tomato sauce and simmer for 15–20 minutes.
Stir in cream and simmer for another 5 minutes.
Serve over rice with naan.

recipes.name: Sheet Pan Veggie Tacos
recipes.description: Roasted peppers, onions, and black beans served in warm tortillas.
ingredients: 1 can black beans, drained and rinsed
steps: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Toss peppers, onion, and beans with olive oil and spices.
Spread on a sheet pan and roast for 15–20 minutes.
Warm tortillas and fill with roasted veggies.
Top with salsa, cheese, or avocado as desired.

recipes.name: Lemon Garlic Salmon with Roasted Broccoli
recipes.description: Roasted salmon fillets with lemon, garlic, and broccoli florets.
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Toss broccoli with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Place salmon on a sheet pan, top with garlic and lemon slices.
Add broccoli around salmon.
Bake for 15–18 minutes until salmon flakes easily.

recipes.name: One-Pot Creamy Tuscan Chicken Pasta
recipes.description: Creamy pasta with chicken, spinach, and sun-dried tomatoes in one pot.
steps: Sauté chicken until lightly browned.
Add garlic and cook briefly.
Add pasta, broth, cream, and sun-dried tomatoes.
Simmer until pasta is cooked.
Stir in spinach until wilted.

recipes.name: Black Bean & Sweet Potato Chili
recipes.description: Hearty vegetarian chili with black beans and sweet potatoes.
steps: Sauté onion and garlic until softened.
Add sweet potato and spices, cook a few minutes.
Add beans, tomatoes, and broth.
Simmer 25–30 minutes until sweet potato is tender.

recipes.name: Beef & Broccoli Stir Fry
recipes.description: Quick stir fry with sliced beef, broccoli, and a savory sauce.
steps: Marinate beef in soy sauce and cornstarch.
Stir-fry beef until browned, remove from pan.
Stir-fry broccoli and garlic.
Return beef and add oyster sauce, toss to coat.

recipes.name: Crispy Pork Carnitas Tacos
recipes.description: Slow-simmered pork crisped under the broiler and served in tortillas.
steps: Simmer pork with onion, garlic, orange juice, and spices until tender.
Shred pork and spread on a sheet pan.
Broil until edges are crispy.
Serve in warm tortillas with toppings.

recipes.name: Margherita Flatbread Pizza
recipes.description: Flatbread topped with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and basil.
steps: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Spread sauce on flatbreads.
Top with mozzarella slices.
Bake 8–10 minutes until cheese melts.
Garnish with basil and drizzle with olive oil.

recipes.name: Peanut Noodle Veggie Bowls
recipes.description: Rice noodles with a peanut sauce and crunchy veggies.
steps: Cook rice noodles according to package.
Whisk peanut butter, soy sauce, lime, and syrup with water.
Toss noodles with sauce and veggies.
Serve with extra lime wedges.

recipes.name: Shrimp Fried Rice
recipes.description: Fried rice with shrimp, peas, carrots, and eggs.
steps: Scramble eggs in a hot pan, set aside.
Stir-fry shrimp until pink, remove.
Stir-fry rice with peas and carrots.
Add soy sauce, eggs, shrimp, and green onions and toss.

recipes.name: BBQ Chicken Sheet Pan Dinner
recipes.description: BBQ chicken thighs roasted with potatoes and green beans.
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Toss potatoes and green beans with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Spread on sheet pan with chicken thighs.
Brush chicken with BBQ sauce.
Roast 30–35 minutes until chicken is cooked through.

recipes.name: Veggie Frittata
recipes.description: Egg-based frittata with spinach, peppers, and cheese.
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Whisk eggs, milk, salt, and pepper.
Add veggies and cheese.
Pour into greased oven-safe skillet.
Bake 15–18 minutes until set.

recipes.name: Lentil Bolognese over Pasta
recipes.description: Hearty tomato sauce with lentils served over pasta.
steps: Cook lentils until tender.
Sauté onion and garlic, then add marinara and lentils.
Simmer 10–15 minutes.
Cook pasta and serve topped with lentil sauce.

recipes.name: Teriyaki Tofu Rice Bowls
recipes.description: Crispy tofu with teriyaki sauce over rice and steamed veggies.
steps: Press tofu, then toss with cornstarch.
Pan-fry until crispy.
Add teriyaki sauce and coat.
Serve over rice with steamed broccoli.

recipes.name: Greek Chicken Bowls
recipes.description: Bowls with marinated chicken, cucumbers, tomatoes, and feta over rice.
steps: Marinate chicken in olive oil, lemon, and oregano.
Cook chicken in a skillet until done.
Assemble bowls with rice, chicken, veggies, and feta.

recipes.name: Slow Cooker Beef Stew
recipes.description: Comforting beef stew with potatoes, carrots, and onions.
steps: Add all ingredients to a slow cooker.
Cook on low 8 hours or high 4–5 hours.
Adjust seasoning before serving.

recipes.name: Fish Taco Bowls
recipes.description: Seasoned fish over rice with slaw and lime crema.
steps: Season fish with chili powder and cumin.
Bake or pan-cook until flaky.
Mix cabbage with a bit of lime and salt.
Stir lime juice into sour cream for crema.
Serve fish over rice with slaw and crema.

recipes.name: Chickpea Coconut Curry
recipes.description: Creamy curry with chickpeas and spinach in coconut milk.
steps: Sauté onion in oil until soft.
Stir in curry powder.
Add chickpeas and coconut milk, simmer 10–15 minutes.
Stir in spinach until wilted.

recipes.name: Beef Meatballs with Zoodles
recipes.description: Oven-baked beef meatballs served over zucchini noodles and marinara.
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Mix beef, egg, crumbs, seasoning, and form meatballs.
Bake 15–20 minutes until cooked through.
Warm marinara and sauté zoodles briefly.
Serve meatballs over zoodles with sauce.

recipes.name: Honey Garlic Glazed Salmon
recipes.description: Pan-seared salmon with a sticky honey garlic glaze, served with steamed asparagus.
steps: Season salmon with salt and pepper.
Sear salmon in a hot pan skin-side up for 4 minutes, then flip.
Mix honey, soy sauce, and garlic.
Add butter and honey mixture to pan, baste salmon.
Steam asparagus until tender-crisp.
Serve salmon over asparagus, drizzled with glaze.

recipes.name: Classic Beef Tacos
recipes.description: Seasoned ground beef in crispy taco shells with all the fixings.
steps: Brown ground beef in a skillet, drain excess fat.
Add taco seasoning and 1/4 cup water, simmer 5 minutes.
Warm taco shells according to package.
Fill shells with beef and top with cheese, lettuce, tomato.
Serve with sour cream and salsa.

recipes.name: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.description: Creamy Italian risotto with sautéed mushrooms and parmesan cheese.
steps: Sauté mushrooms in butter until golden, set aside.
Sauté shallot in olive oil, add rice and toast 2 minutes.
Add wine and stir until absorbed.
Add broth one ladle at a time, stirring constantly.
Continue until rice is creamy and al dente (about 20 min).
Stir in mushrooms, parmesan, and butter.
Garnish with fresh thyme.

recipes.name: Baked Ziti with Sausage
recipes.description: Hearty baked pasta with Italian sausage, ricotta, and melted mozzarella.
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Cook pasta until just al dente, drain.
Brown sausage, breaking into pieces.
Mix pasta, sausage, marinara, and ricotta.
Pour into baking dish, top with mozzarella and parmesan.
Bake 25–30 minutes until bubbly and golden.
Garnish with fresh basil.

recipes.name: Thai Basil Chicken
recipes.description: Spicy stir-fried ground chicken with Thai basil and a fried egg over rice.
ingredients: 2 Thai chilies, sliced (or 1 tsp chili flakes)
steps: Cook jasmine rice according to package.
Stir-fry garlic and chilies in hot oil for 30 seconds.
Add ground chicken, cook until browned.
Add soy sauce, fish sauce, oyster sauce, and sugar.
Toss in Thai basil until just wilted.
Fry eggs sunny-side up.
Serve chicken over rice topped with fried egg.

recipes.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipes.description: Bell peppers stuffed with seasoned beef, rice, and topped with melted cheese.
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Cut tops off peppers and remove seeds.
Brown beef, drain, and mix with rice, tomatoes, and seasoning.
Stuff peppers with beef mixture.
Place in baking dish, cover with foil.
Bake 30 minutes, remove foil, top with cheese.
Bake 10 more minutes until cheese is melted.

recipes.name: Coconut Shrimp with Mango Salsa
recipes.description: Crispy coconut-crusted shrimp served with fresh mango salsa.
ingredients: 1 lb large shrimp, peeled and deveined
steps: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Mix coconut and panko in a bowl.
Dredge shrimp in flour, dip in egg, coat in coconut mixture.
Place on baking sheet, bake 12–15 minutes until golden.
Mix mango, onion, jalapeño, lime juice, and cilantro for salsa.
Serve shrimp with mango salsa.

recipes.name: Vegan Buddha Bowl
recipes.description: Nourishing bowl with quinoa, roasted chickpeas, avocado, and tahini drizzle.
steps: Cook quinoa according to package.
Toss chickpeas with cumin, salt, and oil.
Roast chickpeas at 400°F for 20 minutes until crispy.
Whisk tahini with lemon juice and water to thin.
Assemble bowls with quinoa, chickpeas, avocado, cabbage, carrots.
Drizzle with tahini dressing.

recipes.name: Pulled Pork Sandwiches
recipes.description: Slow cooker pulled pork with tangy coleslaw on soft brioche buns.
steps: Rub pork with paprika, salt, and pepper.
Place in slow cooker with vinegar and brown sugar.
Cook on low 8 hours until fork-tender.
Shred pork and mix with BBQ sauce.
Toss coleslaw mix with mayo and a splash of vinegar.
Pile pork on buns and top with coleslaw.

recipes.name: Eggplant Parmesan
recipes.description: Breaded eggplant slices baked with marinara and melted mozzarella.
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Salt eggplant slices and let sit 20 minutes, pat dry.
Mix breadcrumbs and parmesan.
Dip eggplant in egg, then breadcrumb mixture.
Bake on sheet pan 20 minutes, flipping halfway.
Layer in baking dish with marinara and mozzarella.
Bake 15 minutes until cheese is bubbly.

recipes.name: One-Pan Lemon Herb Chicken & Potatoes
recipes.description: Juicy chicken thighs roasted with golden potatoes and fresh herbs.
steps: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Toss potatoes with oil, garlic, herbs, salt, and pepper.
Spread on sheet pan, nestle chicken thighs on top.
Season chicken and drizzle with lemon juice.
Roast 35–40 minutes until chicken reaches 165°F.
Let rest 5 minutes before serving.

recipes.name: Vegetable Pad Thai
recipes.description: Classic Thai noodles with tofu, bean sprouts, and tangy tamarind sauce.
steps: Soak rice noodles in warm water until softened.
Press and cube tofu, pan-fry until golden.
Mix tamarind, soy sauce, maple syrup, and vinegar for sauce.
Stir-fry noodles with sauce until coated.
Add tofu, bean sprouts, and green onions.
Serve with crushed peanuts and lime wedges.

recipes.name: Beef Stroganoff
recipes.description: Tender beef strips in a creamy mushroom sauce over egg noodles.
steps: Cook egg noodles according to package.
Sear beef strips in hot pan, set aside.
Sauté onion and mushrooms in butter until golden.
Add garlic and flour, stir 1 minute.
Pour in beef broth, simmer until thickened.
Remove from heat, stir in sour cream and beef.
Serve over egg noodles, garnish with parsley.

recipes.name: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad
recipes.description: Fresh and light quinoa salad with cucumber, tomatoes, olives, and lemon dressing.
steps: Cook quinoa according to package, let cool.
Chop all vegetables.
Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Toss quinoa with vegetables and dressing.
Serve chilled or at room temperature.

recipes.name: Crispy Baked Chicken Tenders
recipes.description: Kid-friendly crispy chicken tenders baked to golden perfection.
steps: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Mix panko with garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Dredge chicken in flour, dip in egg, coat in panko.
Place on greased baking sheet.
Bake 18–20 minutes, flipping halfway, until golden.
Serve with honey mustard dipping sauce.
